subject: Re: [junit] Eclipse is closed automatically when tried to add Junit
msgSnippet: ... Hash: SHA1 ... What error is logged in this file? $yourworkspace/.metadata/.log Also are you using the correct VM version? You might want to checkout the
messageBody:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


[06/15/2006 02:47 AM IST] arches73 wrote:
> But as soon as I click "Add external JARs" it closes eclipse
> window and comes out.
>
> Appreciate any input on this. Do I need to do any setups
> or version mismatch..?

What error is logged in this file?
$yourworkspace/.metadata/.log

Also are you using the correct VM version?

You might want to checkout the README for Running Eclipse.

Anand

- --
"I wonder if James can go ask them whether it was the handbrake
or the foot brake." (On Irvine's brake 'problem')
